Title: NBA probes branch Chairman over appointment of ex-convict as patron
Summary: NBA probes branch Chairman over appointment of ex-convict as a Grand Patron of its Garki branch in Abuja . The Nigerian Bar Association (NBA), on Friday, flayed the appointment .

Title: Abiodun sets up committee for state burial of former Ogun First Lady
Summary: Ogun State Governor, Dapo Abiodun, has announced the constitution of a committee to organise a befitting burial for the former First Lady of the state . Chief Mrs. Lucia Onabanjo was the first lady of Ogun state .

Title: Dangote refinery to make Nigeria net exporter of refined fuel – Shettima
Summary: Shettima described the initiative as a bold reimagining of Africa’s shared future built through African-led cooperation, and rooted in sovereignty and self-determination .

Title: Trump says US ‘armada’ headed toward Gulf
Summary: The prospect of immediate American action seemed to recede in recent days, with both sides insisting on giving diplomacy a chance . Both sides have insisted that diplomacy is the best way to avoid immediate action .

Title: Kajuru abductions: PFN demands immediate rescue of over 100 kidnapped worshippers
Summary: Pentecostal Fellowship of Nigeria (PFN) condemns abduction of over 100 Christian worshippers in Kaduna State . The group described the incident as a tragic setback to recent hopes of improved security in the state . PFN demands immediate rescue of the kidnapped worshippers .
